uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Order

  • public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
    Order class which holds an ArrayList of OrderItems and methods additional data like Customer name for the current order and the quantity of each object in the ArrayList of OrderItems
    Author:
    stk4

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item item,
           int quantity)
        calls the updateItemQuantity method. If that return false it creates an new OrderItem and add it to the ArrayList items
        Parameters:
        item - it has to be an Object that implements this Project Item interface
        quantity - quantity for object that is going to be added

      • updateItemQuantity

        public boolean updateItemQuantity(Item item,
                         int quantity)
        loops through the ArrayList of OrderItems, and checks if the input-item already exists inside the list if yes it add 1 to the quantity each time this method is called
        Parameters:
        item - - the item which it looks for in the ArrayList
        quantity - int - quantity of the item you want to add / of the item that already exists
        Returns:
        boolean true - when the Item was found
